metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12611 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Apache Struts 2.0.0 through 2.3.33 and 2.5 through 2.5.10.1, using an unintentional expression in a Freemarker tag instead of string literals can lead to a RCE attack.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
